Login.subtitle: Real-time error monitoring for your Docker apps
Login.errorInvalid: Email or password is incorrect. Please try again.

Signup.title: Create your BugRadar account
Signup.subtitle: Monitor your apps. Catch bugs early. Sleep better.

Projects.loadErrorAuth: Couldn't load projects. Are you signed in?
Projects.createSuccessDesc: Save this API key. You'll need it to configure your agent.
Projects.noProjects: You don't have any projects yet. Create one!
Projects.deleteConfirmPrompt:
This will permanently delete the project and ALL its logs.

To confirm, type the project name: "{projectName}"
Projects.deleteNameMismatch: The name does not match. The project was NOT deleted.
Projects.installAgentDesc: Run this command on the server where your containers are running:

LogStream.title: Log Stream
LogStream.empty: No logs found for this project.

AlertAndChart.title: Average Recovery Time (mins) - Last 7 days
AlertAndChart.empty: No resolved events in the last 7 days.

RecentActivity.title: Recent activity
RecentActivity.resolvedEvent: Event in {container} marked as resolved by {user}.
RecentActivity.ignoredEvent: Event in {container} marked as ignored by {user}.

Detail.title: Unhandled Promise Rejection: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'config')
Detail.errorDescription: An asynchronous operation failed to retrieve necessary configuration, leading to an attempt to access properties of an undefined object.

Stats.needLogin: You need to be logged in to view these statistics.

Latency.title: Request Latency
Latency.noDataDesc: No latency data has been received for this project in the last 24 hours.

Settings.notifySubtitle: Email where you'll receive BugRadar alerts.
Settings.resetError: Could not send the reset link:
Settings.resetSent: We've sent you an email to reset your password.
Settings.securitySubtitle: Change your avatar and reset your password any time.

ResetPassword.title: Reset password
ResetPassword.subtitle: Enter your new password. This link is single-use and will expire.
ResetPassword.noTokens: Session tokens were not found in the reset link.
ResetPassword.validateError: Could not validate the recovery link.
ResetPassword.passwordHint: Minimum 8 characters. Add numbers and symbols for more security.
ResetPassword.minLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
ResetPassword.successDesc: You can now close this page and log in with your new password.
